core:process.core:name: Validate Card As Payment Card
core:process.core:comment: Validate card process for card tender. Although this process is specifically for payment card tenders, the intention is that the majority of the actions can be reused in more general card validation.

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: It is known that UnionPay swiped cards having '0000' expiry date can't be accepted by Optomany. This could perhaps be generalised to all swiped cards.

core:action.core:comment: If fallback to MSR is being used, check if allowed when card is an ICC

core:assignAction.core:comment: For chip cards which fail ICC read but have a track2 indicating not ICC, e.g. ETEC Interop 22.
Set (potentially truncated) service code for service code checking.

core:eventLink.core:comment: Start date probably not present for contactless mag-stripe mode
